channel.title: Need prayer icon tut for servers
channel.description: i need the server part of the prayer tut.. i searched the whole site and didnt find anything exept the client half..

item.title: Need prayer icon tut for servers
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

were do i add this?

public int headIcon = 0; [br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 02:45:15 PM[/size][hr]headicons prayer isnt in my player.java…

Read full topic
item.source: Need prayer icon tut for servers

item.title: Need prayer icon tut for servers
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

In client.java (for your client) search for headicons, replace it with

headicons_prayer

ServerSide:
Than add this int if not have in player.java(serverside)

public int headIcon = 0;

Now search for

playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[0]);

Than the one below it make it look like

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Close player.java and open client.java(serverside)
Add this command where your commands are:

else if(command.startsWith("newhed")) { int newheadicon2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); headIcon = newheadicon2; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Close, save, compile.

not my code…

Read full topic
